calculator

Interface Calculator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RevPolishCalc, StandardCalc

    public interface Calculator
    An interface for RPN calculator and infix calculator to implement.
    Author:
    Bruce

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float evaluate(java.lang.String what)
      A method that calculate the value of an expression.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        float evaluate(java.lang.String what)
               throws InvalidExpressionException
        A method that calculate the value of an expression.
        Parameters:
        what - the string contains an expression.
        Returns:
        the value after calculate the expression.
        Throws:
        InvalidExpressionException - when the expression is empty or
        unbalanced, or there are unknown operators in it.
